commit.message:
Rollup merge of #66086 - RalfJung:smallvec, r=nagisa

bump smallvec to 1.0

This includes https://github.com/servo/rust-smallvec/pull/162, fixing an unsoundness in smallvec.

See https://github.com/servo/rust-smallvec/pull/175 for the 1.0 release announcement.

Cc @mbrubeck @emilio

verification.payload:
tree 21d9dbb2693a5ea4f8fc08b7241021dd1e14b92c
parent 98cbe179032726052d672334bb1a82cd4f604072
parent 90b8d34c9f0d17c948801f676a96800e8b038508
author Mazdak Farrokhzad <twingoow@gmail.com> 1573020188 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1573020188 +0100

Rollup merge of #66086 - RalfJung:smallvec, r=nagisa

bump smallvec to 1.0

This includes https://github.com/servo/rust-smallvec/pull/162, fixing an unsoundness in smallvec.

See https://github.com/servo/rust-smallvec/pull/175 for the 1.0 release announcement.

Cc @mbrubeck @emilio
